shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dawit “Psalter” (fols. 3r-180ra) I-1) Mäzmurä Dawit “Psalms of David” (fols. 3r-142r) I-2) Mäḥalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets” (fols. 142r-156r) I-3) Mäḥalǝyä mäḥalǝy “Song of Songs” (fols. 156r-164r) I-4) Wǝddase Maryam “Praise of Mary” (fols. 165ra-175ra) I-5) ʾAnqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light” (fols. 175rb-180ra)
Additiones 1-3.

donors.donor: The name of the original donor/owner has been erased from the supplication formulas on fols. 142r and 164r, and from the concluding supplication formula on fol. 180ra. The names of Wäldä Giyorgis and Wälättä Maryam are written in the supplication formulas added in a secondary hand on fols. 10v, 18v, 27r.

txstates.txstate: The leather cover of the front board and the spine is torn off. A piece of textile (inlays?) is attached to fol. 1r. Many fols. are stained with wax. Tears, mainly along the vertical lines, are visible on fols. 37, 38, 56, 58, 63, 111, 112. Tears amended on fols. 6, 9, 10, 78, 114, 124, 149, 178.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with dark brown tooled leather (preserved on the back board and as turn-ins on both boards); textile inlays. Overback made of tooled leather of different colour (preserved on the back board and as turn-ins). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the dark brown leather cover (at least 4 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, double crescent with dots, criss-cross).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(10/fols. 3r-12v) – II(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 13r-20v) – III(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 21r-30v) – IV(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 31r-38v) – V(10/fols. 39r-48v) – VI(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; 7, stub after 3/fols. 49r-58v) – VII(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 59r-68v) – VIII(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 69r-78v) – IX(10/fols. 79r-88v) – X(10/fols. 89r-98v) – XI(10/fols. 99r-108v) – XII(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 109r-118v) – XIII(10/fols. 119r-128v) – XIV(10/fols. 129r-138v) – XV(10/fols. 139r-148v) – XVI(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 149r-158v) – XVII(10/fols. 159r-168v) – XVIII(8/fols. 169r-176v) – XIX(6/fols. 177r-182v) – XX(4/fols. 183r-186v).

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data are for fol. 4r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are mostly visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are not visible. Ruling pricks are mostly visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-4, I-5: all data are for fol. 170r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling (below the ruling on fols. 165r, 166rv, 168rv). The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra (name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); supplication formulas with the name of the original donor/owner; titles and numbers of the Pss., Canticles and Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; name of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5 (written out fully or abbreviated); elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
A few lines (alternating with black lines) on the incipit page of text I-4; a few lines (alternating with black lines) of the incipit of text I-5.

abbreviations.abbreviation: Text I-4 ሰ፤ ለ፤ ቅ፤ for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት ሠ፡/ሠረ፡/ሠረቀ፡ for ሠረቀ፡ በሥጋ፡ እምድንግል፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ዘርአ፡ ብእሲ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 165ra-vb) እ᎓/እስ፡ for እስመ፡ በፈቃዱ፡ ወበሥምረቱ፡ አቡሁ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ መጽአ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 166ra-167rb) ኵ፡/ኵሉ፡ for ኵሉ፡ ትውልድ፡ ያስተበፅዑኪ፡ ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ (fols. 167vb-169rb) ናዓ፡/ናዓብ: for ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ። እስመ፡ ሣህልኪ፡ ይኵን፡ ላዕለ፡ ኵልነ (fols. 170ra-171rb) ለኪ፡ for ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ እመ፡ ብርሃን፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ በስብሐት፡ ወበውዳሴ (fols. 171vb-172rb) ተፈ፡ for ተፈሥሒ፡ ኦምልዕልተ፡ ጸጋ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኪ፡ ሞገስ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌኪ (fols. 173ra-vb) ወበ፡/ወበእንተዝ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 174va-175ra) Text I-5 ወበ፡/ወበእንተዝ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 176rb-179rb)

otherdetails.otherdetail: - Traditional interpretation of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 is missing.

additional.cont: Fols. 164r-v: One miracle of Mary, incomplete.
additional.det: The name of the supplicant has been erased.

additional.cont: Fols. 180ra-185ra: Mälkǝˀa Mikaˀel “Image of Mikaˀel”, incomplete.
additional.det: The name of the supplicant has been erased from the final line. Cp. edition: Säbattu kidanat. Qǝddase Maryam. Mälkǝʾa gubaʾe, Addis Abäba 1959 E.C., 290-311.

extras.extra: - Directives for praying with the Pss. are written in the upper margin, in a secondary hand: fols. 5r, 5v, 16v, 17r, 20r, 22v, 30r, 32v. - The scribe reduced the size of his handwriting: fols. 113v, 119r. - Part of the line is taken up: fols. 9r, 113v, 122r, 124v, 127r, 134r, 150r, 150v, 160v, 163v. - Omitted words, lines or passages inserted interlineally in Texts I-4 and I-5, in a secondary hand: fols. 166ra, 171vb, 178va. - Erasures marked with thin lines: fols. 163v. - Erasure: 171vb. - Minor notes, writing exercises, scribbles: fols. 3r, 4r, 9v, 22v, 23r, 27r, 30r, 60r, 70v, 83r, 91v, 93v, 98v, 99v, 127r, 132r, 133v, 176r, 179v, 180r, 185v, 186r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Blue thread inserted in the right upper corner of fol. 65.
